title: Andrade (D. Manuel Joaquim Gonçalves de)
body: This prelate of the diocese of S. Paulo (Brazil) was born in the parish of Campanário on March 14, 1767, the son of Nicolau Gonçalves de Andrade and Maria de Andrade. In October 1826, he was confirmed as the bishop of that diocese and was consecrated on October 28 of the following year. He passed away on May 26, 1847. We are unaware of any other circumstances of this prelate's life. He was the uncle of Counselor Francisco Justino Gonçalves de Andrade, whom we have already discussed here.

Campanário: Parish where D. Manuel Joaquim Gonçalves de Andrade was born

D. Manuel Joaquim Gonçalves de Andrade: Prelate of the diocese of S. Paulo (Brazil)
Nicolau Gonçalves de Andrade: Father of D. Manuel Joaquim Gonçalves de Andrade
Maria de Andrade: Mother of D. Manuel Joaquim Gonçalves de Andrade
Conselheiro Francisco Justino Gonçalves: Nephew of D. Manuel Joaquim Gonçalves de Andrade

1767: D. Manuel Joaquim Gonçalves de Andrade was born in the parish of Campanário on March 14
1826: In October, he was confirmed as the bishop of the diocese of S. Paulo
1847: D. Manuel Joaquim Gonçalves de Andrade passed away on May 26
